mapper.sql: sid, screatedate, uid, sstatus, sdescription, sname, stel, semail, cid
mapper.insert: insert into middlestudent (sid, screatedate, uid, sstatus, sdescription, sname, stel, semail, cid) values (#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{screatedate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{semail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into middlestudent
sid,
screatedate,
uid,
sstatus,

stel,

cid,

mapper.update:
update middlestudent
screatedate = #{screatedate,jdbcType=DATE},
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sstatus = #{sstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sdescription = #{sdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sname = #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stel = #{stel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
semail = #{semail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
